CSV/TSV Converter

Convert between CSV, TSV, and JSON formats locally in your browser.

FAQ

Is my data sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.

How are special characters handled?

CSV uses commas as delimiters and handles quoted fields. TSV uses tabs. JSON conversion preserves all data types.
